document_data.name: Glendar
document_data.mainbody: '''Glendar''' was a [[wizard]],{{Cite dragon/102/Nine Wands of Wonder|30}} and later [[lich]].
document_data.Personality: Glendar was known to be a rather good and noble man in life.
document_data.Activities: Glendar spent much of his life serving as a patron for [[adventurer]]s.
document_data.History:
The wizard's hatred of basilisks and medusae led him to develop the ''[[rod of mirrors]]'', also known as a ''wand of magical mirrors'', and went on to create twenty of them.

Later in life Glendar turned towards evil and became a lich.

His ''rods of mirrors'' continued to survive across the Realms following his destruction, falling into treasure caches or coming into the possession of powerful wizards.
